products.title: Bella Blackout Rose Gold Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This gorgeous rose gold panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Frost White Panel Blind
products.description: A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics are simplistic, value for money and come in a wide array of choices. Bella blackout frost white is perfect for large windows or spaces, as they reach up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop. Their panel blinds are cut to your sizes by their expert panel blind team. At swift direct blinds we are so confident of the quality of their products, we provide a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Bella Blackout Cream Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, soft and warm, their bella blackout cream panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.
